osyfe.audio

Class OpenAL

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.audio.OpenAL

  • public class OpenAL
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the OpenAL context and the listener in 3D-space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenAL() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void destroy()
      Destroys the OpenAL context and deletes all remaining Sounds and Sources.
      static void init()
      Initializes OpenAL.
      static void position(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the listeners position.
      static void velocity(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the listeners velocity.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenAL

        public OpenAL()

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Destroys the OpenAL context and deletes all remaining Sounds and Sources. Is called by Screen.open.

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initializes OpenAL. Is called by Screen.open if enabled.

      • position

        public static void position(float x,
                            float y,
                            float z)
        Sets the listeners position.

      • velocity

        public static void velocity(float x,
                            float y,
                            float z)
        Sets the listeners velocity.
